paper_abstract: Visualisation tools make it easier for users to observe the status of the Wireless Sensor Networks (WSNs). So far, developers of WSNs have created various visualisation tools under different project/research backgrounds. These tools, however, are limited in certain application scenarios, since the underlying packet formats are hard coded into the programs. For this purpose, we present NetViewer, a universal visualisation tool for all the applications, and we provide many useful data services to fulfil different needs of various fields.
paper_title: Visualising wireless sensor networks with NetViewer
